```{r}
#Adding a URL when clicking on the point
library(scatterD3)
iris$url <- paste0("https://www.google.com?q=",colnames(iris))
scatterD3(data=iris, 
          x=Petal.Length, 
          y=Sepal.Length, 
          col_var = Species, colors = c("Pink","Plum", "PowderBlue"))
```
